102-186b @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA bar+d+ha nI nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM bi ba bi ba/ pradz+nyA bar+t+ta ni/ dza ra dza ra/ me d+hA bar+d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bu d+d+hi bar+d+ha ni swA hA/ rig sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ nang re zhing rtsa ba mo khyor gang la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ zla ba gcig gi bar du 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / lots+tsha ba ban+de klu'i dbang pos bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra siM ha dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de de ba tsan+d+ras zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ smr-i ti ma ti ma ti/ te dzo bid+yA/ hu ru me hu ru hu ru me kr-iSh+Na hu ru me swA hA/ shu dag nag po la sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te zos na gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs gzungs
